title: Starting Over
description: Teen author Brittany Perloff's debut book, Starting Over, is the first in her series of books for teens. In this book, Jessica (Jess) James is your average teenager. She had lived in a big city all her life, until her life is turned upside down when she finds out sheâ€™s moving to a small paradise island. She is forced to leave the home she grew up in and leave her whole life behind, the good and the bad, to start a new one. Follow Jessica as she discovers love, heartache, friendship and a lesson about life!
author: Brittany Perloff
